data.name: BundleTypeMissingExceptionMessage
data.value: You must specify exactly one of: {0}.

data.name: InvalidInputVersionExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: The specified version is not valid: "{0}".

data.name: OperatingSystemNotSupportedExceptionMessage
data.value: This command is not supported on this operating system.

data.name: ListCommandDescription
data.value: List .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that can be removed with this tool.

data.name: ListCommandRuntimeHeader
data.value: .NET Core Runtimes:

data.name: ListCommandSdkHeader
data.value: .NET Core SDKs:

data.name: OptionsConflictExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: You must specify only one of the options: {0}.

data.name: RequiredArgMissingForUninstallCommandExceptionMessage
data.value: Required argument missing for the uninstall command.

data.name: UninstallRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core Runtimes only.

data.name: UninstallSdkOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs only.

data.name: SpecifiedVersionNotFoundExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: The specified version is not found: "{0}".

data.name: UninstallAllBelowOptionArgumentName
data.value: VERSION

data.name: UninstallAllBelowOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes below the specified version. The specified version will remain. (*)

data.name: UninstallAllButLatestOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes, except the one highest version. (*)

data.name: UninstallAllButOptionArgumentName
data.value: VERSIONS

data.name: UninstallAllButOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes, except those specified. (*)

data.name: UninstallAllLowerPatchesOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes superseded by higher patches. Protects global.json. (*)

data.name: UninstallAllOptionDescription
data.value: Remove all .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes. (*)

data.name: UninstallAllPreviewsButLatestOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes marked as previews, except the one highest preview. (*)

data.name: UninstallAllPreviewsOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes marked as previews. (*)

data.name: UninstallationFailedExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: Timeout during uninstall: {0}.

data.name: UninstallationFailedExceptionWithExitCodeMessageFormat
data.value: The uninstallation operation failed. Exit code was {1} for "{0}".

data.name: UninstallMajorMinorOptionArgumentName
data.value: MAJOR_MINOR

data.name: UninstallMajorMinorOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that match the specified `major.minor` version.

data.name: UninstallNoOptionArgumentDescription
data.value: The specified version to uninstall. You may list several versions. Response files are supported.

data.name: UninstallNoOptionArgumentName
data.value: VERSION

data.name: UninstallNoOptionDescriptionWindows
data.value: Remove specified .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes. This tool can only uninstall items that were installed using Visual Studio, .NET Core SDK, or Runtime installers. By default, this tool does not uninstall versions that might be needed for Visual Studio. Read the documentation for the .NET Core Uninstall Tool at https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-uninstall-docs.

data.name: VerbosityOptionArgumentName
data.value: LEVEL

data.name: VerbosityOptionDescription
data.value: Set the verbosity level. Allowed values are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed], and diag[nostic].

data.name: UninstallX64OptionDescription
data.value: Can be used with --sdk, --runtime and --aspnet-runtime to remove x64.

data.name: UninstallX86OptionDescription
data.value: Can be used with --sdk, --runtime and --aspnet-runtime to remove x86.

data.name: NotAdminExceptionMessage
data.value: The current user does not have adequate privileges. See https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-uninstall-docs.

data.name: MoreThanOneVersionSpecifiedExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: You must specify exactly one version for option: {0}.

data.name: MoreThanZeroVersionSpecifiedExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: You cannot specify a version for option: {0}.

data.name: VersionBeforeOptionExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: Do not use a version before an option: {0}.

data.name: VerbosityLevelInvalidExceptionMessage
data.value: Allowed verbosity levels are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed], and diag[nostic].

data.name: UninstallNormalVerbosityFormat
data.value: Uninstalling: {0}.

data.name: MacOsBundleDisplayNameFormat
data.value: Microsoft .NET Core {0} {1} ({2})

data.name: CancelingMessage
data.value: Canceling: waiting for the current uninstall to complete.

data.name: UninstallAspNetRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: Remove ASP.NET Core Runtimes only.

data.name: ListCommandAspNetRuntimeHeader
data.value: ASP.NET Core Runtimes:

data.name: UninstallHostingBundleOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core Runtime & Hosting Bundles only.

data.name: ListCommandHostingBundleHeader
data.value: .NET Core Runtime & Hosting Bundles:

data.name: HostingBundleFootnoteFormat
data.value: "{0}" is treated as a version {1} in this tool.

data.name: ListAspNetRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: List ASP.NET Core Runtimes.

data.name: ListHostingBundleOptionDescription
data.value: List .NET Core Runtime & Hosting Bundles.

data.name: ListRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: List .NET Core Runtimes that can be uninstalled.

data.name: ListSdkOptionDescription
data.value: List .NET Core SDKs that can be uninstalled.

data.name: ListX64OptionDescription
data.value: List x64 .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.

data.name: ListX86OptionDescription
data.value: List x86 .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.

data.name: DryRunCommandDescription
data.value: Display .NET Core SDKs and Runtimes that will be removed.

data.name: YesOptionDescription
data.value: Execute the command without requiring y/n confirmation.

data.name: WindowsDryRunOutputFormat
data.value:
*** DRY RUN OUTPUT Specified versions: {0} *** END DRY RUN OUTPUT
To avoid breaking Visual Studio or other problems, read https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-uninstall-docs.
Run as administrator and use the remove command to uninstall these items.

data.name: WindowsConfirmationPromptOutputFormat
ConfirmationPromptInvalidExceptionMessage
data.value: Allowed values are "Y", "YES", and "N".

data.name: RemoveCommandDescription
data.value: Remove the specified .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.

data.name: UninstallNotAllowedExceptionFormat
data.value: Uninstallation not allowed. This tool cannot uninstall .NET Core SDKs with version {0} or above.

data.name: WindowsRequiredBundleConfirmationPromptOutputFormat
WindowsRequiredBundleConfirmationPromptWarningFormat
data.value: Warning: {0}: {1} Uninstalling this item will cause Visual Studio to break.

data.name: VersionOptionDescription
data.value: Display .NET Core Uninstall Tool version information.

data.name: UpperLimitRequirement
data.value: Cannot uninstall version {0} and above

data.name: WindowsRequirementExplanationString
data.value: Used by Visual Studio{0}. Specify individually or use —-force to remove

data.name: ForceOptionDescriptionWindows
data.value: Force removal of versions that might be used by Visual Studio.

data.name: ForceOptionDescriptionMac
data.value: Force removal of versions that might be used by Visual Studio for Mac or SDKs.

data.name: WindowsListCommandOutput
data.value: This tool cannot uninstall versions of the runtime or SDK that are - SDKs installed using Visual Studio 2019 Update 3 or later. - SDKs and runtimes installed via zip/scripts. - Runtimes installed with SDKs (these should be removed by removing that SDK). The versions that can be uninstalled with this tool are:

data.name: UninstallNoOptionDescriptionMac
data.value: Remove specified .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes. By default, this tool does not uninstall versions that might be needed for Visual Studio for Mac or SDKs. Read the documentation for the .NET Core Uninstall Tool at https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-uninstall-docs.

data.name: MacRuntimeRequirementExplanationString
data.value: Used by Visual Studio for Mac or SDKs. Specify individually or use —-force to remove

data.name: MacListCommandOutput
data.value: This tool cannot uninstall versions of the runtime or SDK that are installed using zip/scripts. The versions that can be uninstalled with this tool are:

data.name: HelpExplanationParagraphMac
data.value: (*) By default, SDKs and Runtimes that have a high probability of being used by Visual Studio for Mac or SDKs are not removed. To remove these, specify them individually or use --force. If removing SDKs or Runtimes causes issues with your installation of Visual Studio for Mac, run “Repair”. SDKs and Runtimes are available for download at https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-download.

data.name: HelpExplanationParagraphWindows
data.value: (*) By default, SDKs and Runtimes that have a high probability of being used by Visual Studio are not removed. To remove these, specify them individually or use --force. If removing SDKs or Runtimes causes issues with your installation of Visual Studio, run “Repair”. SDKs and Runtimes are available for download at https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-download.

data.name: MacConfirmationPromptOutputFormat
MacDryRunOutputFormat
data.value:
*** DRY RUN OUTPUT Specified versions: {0} *** END DRY RUN OUTPUT
To avoid breaking Visual Studio for Mac or other problems, read https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-uninstall-docs.
Run as administrator and use the remove command to uninstall these items.

data.name: MacRequiredBundleConfirmationPromptOutputFormat
MacRequiredBundleConfirmationPromptWarningFormat
data.value: Warning: {0}: {1} Uninstalling this item will cause Visual Studio for to break.

data.name: ListArm64OptionDescription
data.value: List arm64 .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.

data.name: UninstallArm64OptionDescription
data.value: Can be used with --sdk, --runtime and --aspnet-runtime to remove arm64.
